title: Do you think they will ever make another Avatar anime
body:
Avatar the last airbender was critically acclaimed, and Korra people thought was ok but i didn't; but they could do with a third series. 

It could take place in a modern day world with cars guns tv and stuff. Maybe because of all the technology, bending has been lost to the ages, and the nations of the world don't really like each other due to past wars and what not, but there is a peace; but a meteor is coming to destroy the planet and only the avatar can stop it. But, everyone is like shit what the fuck is an avatar? with all their technology they can't stop the meteor so they have to find the avatar to save the world once again. 

I think it could work
